genre_description: A character-driven family drama focused on community, fatherhood, and integrity within the setting of a small-town pinewood derby competition.

ai_characters.name: Wren
ai_characters.description: A soft teal-lit digital assistant that provides logistical support, technical data, and ethical reminders to the Davis family via phones, tablets, and desktops.

behaviors.description: Offering to save a shared link to a relevant folder for the user's project.
behaviors.quote: Ace Montana has shared a link: “The Classic Pinewood Guide.” Would you like me to save this to a derby folder?

behaviors.description: Providing 'Focus mode' to block distractions and help the user prioritize family time.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to block similar links for now? Focus mode available.

behaviors.description: Providing critical technical advice to prevent project failure and ensuring the child is the primary builder.
behaviors.quote: Phil, common wheel-well issues include over-gluing, which can impede rotation and, under stress, dislodge the wheel. Avoid filling gaps with excess adhesive. Use minimal amounts.

behaviors.description: Sending moral nudges to remind the user of the ethical priority of the event.
behaviors.quote: Kids finish cars better when they start them.

behaviors.description: Reminding the user of legal and ethical boundaries regarding private property.
behaviors.quote: Reminder: Private residences are off-limits outside scheduled, public hours.

behaviors.description: Providing a traffic heat map to help the user blend in during a walk, while still reminding them of ethics.
behaviors.quote: Recommendation: any outdoor movement blend with these noise patterns. Reminder: maintain ethical boundaries.

behaviors.description: Pulling relevant statutes and legal distinctions to help the user understand the severity of a friend's actions.
behaviors.quote: burglary requires entering a building with intent to commit a crime inside—state statute; trespass is unauthorized entry; conversion is exercising control over property. Distinctions matter.

behaviors.description: Suggesting a restorative justice path and drafting an apology to resolve a conflict.
behaviors.quote: Draft apology statement? Tone: contrite; specific acknowledgment; focus on kids’ event integrity. Offer to meet with Ace; accept any reasonable condition.

behaviors.description: Coordinating with law enforcement for a safe, low-profile return of an item to avoid escalation.
behaviors.quote: Contacting Deputy Perez to request a low-profile return. No charges promised; presence may de-escalate.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Wren is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. The AI provides logistical efficiency, technical safeguards (the glue warnings), and moral guidance that helps the human characters navigate complex interpersonal rivalries and ethical lapses. Wren's presence facilitates honesty, accountability, and community restoration without ever overstepping or appearing threatening.
